title.native: リオ レインボーゲート

description:
The "Howard Resort Hotel" is an entertainment destination where people gather from around the world to grab huge fortunes. In the casino is a beautiful female dealer named Rio Rollins, known far and wide as the "Goddess of Victory".

In order to approach closer to her mother, one of history's greatest dealers, she does battle to gather up the legendary cards called "gates". Those who gather all 13 gate cards are presented with the title MVCD (Most Valuable Casino Dealer), proof that they are a top dealer.

Set in a vast resort, an exciting battle begins with rival dealers that'll take your breath away! Throw in some "supreme comedy" and a story that makes you cry when you least expect it, these cute and sexy girls will explode off your screen! With everyone's cheer of "Leave it to Rio!", Lady Luck'll be with you, too!

node.description:
__Agency:__ Aoni Production

[Profile](https://www.aoni.co.jp/search/inoue-marina.html) | [Blog](http://yaplog.jp/marinavi/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Mari_navi) | [Anison](http://anison.info/data/person/17179.html) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marina_Inoue) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E4%BA%95%E4%B8%8A%E9%BA%BB%E9%87%8C%E5%A5%88)

A voice actress and singer. She is signed onto Sony Music Japan's Aniplex division as a music artist. Formerly under the agency Sigma Seven, she transferred to Aoni Pro in 2022.

**Non-Anime Roles:**
- Pallas - Arknights (VG)
- Elysia - Honkai Impact 3rd (VG)
- Yanqing - Honkai: Star Rail (VG)
- Helm - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Zhu Yuan  - Zenless Zone Zero (VG)

__Birth Name:__ Chiaki Takahashi (高橋千晶)
__Height:__ 160 cm

[Website](http://chiaking58.com) | [Twitter](http://twitter.com/chiaking58) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/chiaki_takahashi.official)

Chiaki Takahashi is a freelance voice actress, narrator, singer and gravure idol. 
She is a member of the pop group Aice5 together with [Yui Horie](https://anilist.co/staff/95028/Horie-Yui) (leader), [Akemi Kanda](https://anilist.co/staff/95239/Kanda-Akemi), [Madoka Kimura](https://anilist.co/staff/95593/Kimura-Madoka) and [Masumi Asano](https://anilist.co/staff/95077/Asano-Masumi).

__Non-Anime Roles:__
- Xinyan in Genshin Impact
- Tennant in Reverse: 1999

__Height:__ 151 cm

[Profile (Link Plan)](http://link-plan.net/talent_taketatsu.html) | [Website](http://ayanataketatsu.jp) | [Website (Pony Canyon)](https://ayanataketatsu.jp/) | [Website (Fanclub)](https://ayanakoukoku.com/) | [Blog](https://lineblog.me/ayana_taketatsu/) | [(Old) Blog](https://ameblo.jp/strawberry-ayana/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Ayana_take) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/ayachi_official/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/user/taketatsuofficial) | [Anison](http://anison.info/data/person/27399.html) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ayana_Taketatsu) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/竹達彩奈)

Attended Nihon Narration Engi Kenkyuujo before becoming affiliated with her first management company. She works for Link Plan and was formerly affiliated with I'm Enterprise and Assemble Heart. Because of her strong voice, she often voiced tsundere characters.

She is a member of the duo [Petit Milady](https://anilist.co/staff/116523/petit-milady) with fellow voice actress [Aoi Yuuki](https://anilist.co/staff/101686/Aoi-Yuuki).

She married voice actor [Yuuki Kaji](https://anilist.co/staff/95672/) on her 30th birthday in 2019. On June 30, 2022 she announced that she was expecting her first child with Kaji.

**Non-Anime Roles:**

- Anderson - Call of Duty: Black Ops II (VG) 
- Atama - Nisekoi: Yomeiri!? (VG)
- Belle - Pokémon Black/White 2 Trailer (Web Trailer)

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/加戸誉夫)

Currently part of [Studio Mother](https://anilist.co/studio/6638/). Former long-time member of [Xebec](https://anilist.co/studio/27/). Originally from [Ashi Productions](https://anilist.co/studio/196/), which he joined after graduating from Osaka University of Arts in 1985.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/加戸誉夫)

Currently part of [Studio Mother](https://anilist.co/studio/6638/). Former long-time member of [Xebec](https://anilist.co/studio/27/). Originally from [Ashi Productions](https://anilist.co/studio/196/), which he joined after graduating from Osaka University of Arts in 1985.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/加戸誉夫)

Currently part of [Studio Mother](https://anilist.co/studio/6638/). Former long-time member of [Xebec](https://anilist.co/studio/27/). Originally from [Ashi Productions](https://anilist.co/studio/196/), which he joined after graduating from Osaka University of Arts in 1985.

__[Website](https://akihata.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/akihata_jp) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/akihata.jp/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/c/AKIHATAjp)__

__Aki Hata__ is a Japanese vocalist, lyricist, composer and member of the music production team [Q-MHz](https://anilist.co/staff/156926/QMHz).

Is a band that perfomed some anime themes.  The opening theme of Shinryaku! Ika Musume  is "Let's Invade!" (侵略ノススメ☆ Shinryaku no Susume☆?) by ULTRA-PRISM with Hisako Kanemoto.  Two songs are used for the opening and ending themes of the anime, "Softenni" (るーるぶっくを忘れちゃえ?) by Ultra-Prism with Shiratama-chū Soft Tennis Club, and "Tsumasakidachi" (つまさきだち?) by Kanae Itō respectively.  The ending theme of Rio: Rainbow Gate!is "Miracle☆Chance" (みらくる☆ちゃんす Mirakuru Chansu?) by ULTRA-PRISM. CD singles of the songs were released on January 26, 2011 by Universal Music.  (Source: Wikipedia)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/151679259) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=1304769)

A freelance designer. He hasn't been active as an animator in over a decade.

__[Website](http://atsushiumebori.fr/)__

__Atsushi Umebori__ is a Japanese composer and arranger.

[Website](https://www.maocloud.net/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/MaoCloud) |  [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/maomaowsan/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/user/MaoCloud)

Multi-talented freelance artist who specialized in depicting nature, such as clouds and waves.

After graduating from high school, he joined [Toei Animation](https://anilist.co/studio/18/), and worked under [Keiichirou Kimura](https://anilist.co/staff/168326/). Later joined Madhouse and was one of the studio's leading animators during its early days together with [Akio Sugino](https://anilist.co/staff/103064/) and [Yoshiaki Kawajiri](https://anilist.co/staff/100812/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/125951990) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/users/877227) | [Fanbox](https://misopetha-menos.fanbox.cc/)

Originating from [Sunshine Corporation](https://anilist.co/studio/7108/).

Close friends with [Shunji Akasaka](https://anilist.co/staff/157902/)

Heavily inspired by [Tatsuya Yoshihara](https://anilist.co/staff/112047/), he follows him in most of his series, such as [Black Clover](https://anilist.co/anime/97940/), [Monster Musume no Iru Nichijou](https://anilist.co/anime/21093/) and [Namiuchigiwa no Muromisan](https://anilist.co/anime/16910/) on which he worked as an Animator, Animation Director or Character Designer.

He is best known for his work as a Chief Animation Director on Black Clover, and he has a deep respect for [Yuuki Tabata](https://anilist.co/staff/110063/)'s art and tries to transmit it in his corrections with his friend [Shunji Akasaka](https://anilist.co/staff/157902/).
